text: avanan ninnale mannil ninn srsticcat. pinne bijakanattil ninn. pinnit bhrunattilninnum. tutarnn sisuvayi avan ninnale purattukeantuvarunnu. atinusesam ninnal karuttunetananit. avasanam ninnal vrd'dharayittiranum. ninnalil cilar neratte tanne maranamatayunnu. ninnalkku niscayikkappetta avadhiyilettanumanit. oruvela ninnal cinticc manas'silakkiyenkilea
